attributes.action: Get victims of Domestic violence justice
attributes.additional_details:
Many victims have gone without justice and the abuser allowed to go on abusing others simply because they didn’t get it reported in the 6 month from incident time frame, this has to stop. Many victims having left the relationship haven’t even processed the abuse in 6 months whilst trying to rebuild life, character and a new healthy ‘normal’. 
I’d like the government to put a stop to this, give victims longer or no time frame especially in cases there is hard evidence.
attributes.background: Take away or extend the 6 month limit victims of domestic abuse and violence have to report abuse.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611638
